name: NFT Marketplace
description: This is an NFT marketplace application that you can buy and sell NFTs. I have also created an NFT collection based on my dog photos :)

name: Auction Dapp
description: This demo is an auction application which users can bid on products listed by the contract owner and also claim the product when the bidding time is finished.

name: Pianorium
description: A local piano lecturer's website to advertise and keep in touch with the new students.

name: neoAuvra
description: Full-stack application to manage user VR game sessions, store VR game data and do evaluation based on the VR game metrics
